sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"仪器，设备，器械，器具"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: apparatus, instrument, device, equipment, tool, implement, installation, appliance, facilities
means: apparatus ：既可指某种具体的由许多不同零件构成的复杂的仪器、装置或器械，又可指它们的总称。
instrument ：通常指能使人们完成某一精确动作或测量的一种小型仪器，尤指电工仪表、测量装置，航海或航空用的控制装置。
device ：多指为某一特殊用途或解决某一特定机械问题而设计或改装的精巧的仪器或装置。
equipment ：多指成套的或重型的设备或装备。通常用作不可数名词。
tool ：一般指进行特种工作的手工工具，也可指人造使用动力的工具，还可作引申用。
implement ：原指史前人类所用的工具，现在多指农用工具，也可指为实现某个任务所需的工具或器具。
installation ：一般多指安装完成，可供使用或操作的整套装置或设施。
appliance ：侧重指家用机器或设备，尤指家用电器。
facilities ：常用复数形式，指可供使用的设备或设施。

sentence.Network_en: I get very nervous because I'm using a lot of expensive equipment.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为正在使用很多昂贵的设备，所以我非常紧张。

sentence.Network_en: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentence.Network_cn: 海关官员们对这种设备作出了一系列互相矛盾的陈述。

sentence.Network_en: Having the right equipment at hand will be enormously helpful.
sentence.Network_cn: 手头上有合适的设备将会帮上大忙。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French équipement, from équiper 'equip'

entry.def: Equipment consists of the things which are used for a particular purpose, for example a hobby or job.

example.tran: 计算机、电子设备和机床

means.word_mean: 1. an instrumentality needed for an undertaking or to perform a service

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快
stems_affixes.word_buile: refresh使清新+ment行为或结果等→精力恢复,爽快→点心,饮料
commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]

Sentence.sentence: In future, companies may develop hybrid (混合的) models, listing excess capacity (whether vehicles, equipment or office.
The sound equipment has to be set up.
An X-rays technician is refusing to do her job until the firm agrees to replace its out-dated equipment.
The equipment in American studios was more advanced than anything in Britain, which had led the Beatles' great rivals, the Rolling Stones, to make their latest album, "Aftermath", in Los Angeles.
I can't seem to get anyone in the hospital to listen to my complaints and this outdated equipment is dangerous.

I made an effort to get my supervisor to transfer me to another department, but he urged me not to complain too loudly, because the administration is more likely to replace me than the X-ray equipment

means.word_mean: 设备; 器材; 装备; 配备

sentences.en: We must fit the expedition out with the best equipment.
sentences.cn: 我们必须向探险队提供最好的装备。

sentences.en: He has the equipment for the job.
sentences.cn: 他具备这项工作的知识和技能。

jushi.english: Spending on military equipment has multiplied in the last five years.
jushi.chinese: 过去5年中军事装备的开支大大增加。

jushi.english: Do you have the equipment to do the job?
jushi.chinese: 你有才能去做这份工作吗?

jushi.english: The government furnished the scientific expedition with the necessary equipment.
jushi.chinese: 政府提供给科学考察队以必要的装备。
